trans-unit.source: Represents the kind of event that has occurred on a view of a control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje typ zdarzenia w widoku formantu w czasie projektowania.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Klasa ta nie może być dziedziczona.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is provided to the designer component by the design host, for example [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], when raising an event caused by certain user actions on the design-time view of a control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> obiekt został dostarczony do składnika projektanta przez hosta projektu, na przykład [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], gdy wywołanie zdarzenia spowodowane pewne akcje użytkownika, w widoku czasu projektowania formantu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> Zdarzenie jest obsługiwane przez <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegować metody, która przyjmuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> obiektu jako parametr.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> class is a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> Właściwość <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> jest klasa <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> Delegować metody porównuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> właściwości statycznych <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> pola, aby ustalić, jakiego typu akcji zgłoszone zdarzenie.

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised under the following circumstances:
trans-unit.target: Na przykład zdarzenie jest zgłaszane w następujących okolicznościach:

trans-unit.source: You click a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Możesz kliknąć region na powierzchnię projektu.

trans-unit.source: The designer draws a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Projektant rysuje formantu na powierzchni projektu.

trans-unit.source: You enter or exit template editing mode for a control.
trans-unit.target: Wprowadź lub zamknąć trybie kontrolki edycji szablonu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> Klasa zapewnia domyślne pełnomocnika, aby obsłużyć <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Projektanci kontrolki niestandardowej zastępują <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, i <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> metody przetwarzania tych zdarzeń formantu na powierzchni projektu.

trans-unit.source: The designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the type of action on the design surface, and then passes the object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje host projektanta <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> obiektu dla typu akcji na powierzchni projektu, a następnie przekazuje obiekt do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegowanie.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> Właściwość <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> obiektu wskazuje typ akcji:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> Właściwości dostarcza argumentów zdarzenia, które są specyficzne dla typu akcji.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for a click on a designer region.
trans-unit.target: Wskazuje, że Wyświetl zdarzenie zostało zgłoszone dla kliknięcie obszarem projektanta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegować metody porównuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> właściwości statycznych <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> pola, aby ustalić, jakiego typu akcji zgłoszone zdarzenie.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> to indicate that you clicked a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> obiekt jest taki sam <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> aby wskazać, że kliknięto region na powierzchnię projektu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> Klasa zapewnia domyślne <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegowanie.

trans-unit.source: If the event type is <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli typ zdarzenia jest <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>, wywołania delegata <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> metody.

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: Klasy wywodzące się z <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> klasy zastąpienie <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> metody do obsługi kliknij zdarzeń w regionie, w czasie projektowania.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments indicate which designer region was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: Argumenty zdarzenia wskazują, regionu, którego projektanta został kliknięty, jeśli istnieje.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for drawing a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Wskazuje, że Wyświetl zdarzenie zostało zgłoszone dla rysowania formantu na powierzchni projektu.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegować metody porównuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> właściwości statycznych <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> pola, aby ustalić, jakiego typu akcji zgłoszone zdarzenie.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> to indicate a paint event on the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> obiekt jest taki sam <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> aby wskazać zdarzenie malowania w formancie na powierzchni projektu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> Klasa zapewnia domyślne <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegowanie.

trans-unit.source: If the event type is <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli typ zdarzenia jest <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>, wywołania delegata <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> metody.

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: Klasy wywodzące się z <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> klasy zastąpienie <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> metody do obsługi kliknij zdarzeń w regionie, w czasie projektowania.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for changing the template mode of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: Wskazuje, że Wyświetl zdarzenie zostało zgłoszone dla Zmienianie trybu szablon projektanta formantów.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegować metody porównuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> właściwości statycznych <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> pola, aby ustalić, jakiego typu akcji zgłoszone zdarzenie.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> to indicate that the template editing mode changed for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> obiekt jest taki sam <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> do wskazania, że szablon tryb edycji zmieniony kontrolki na powierzchni projektu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> Klasa zapewnia domyślne <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegowanie.

trans-unit.source: If the event type is <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>, the delegate sets the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli typ zdarzenia jest <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>, delegat ustawia wartość <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> właściwości.

trans-unit.source: Custom designers that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> method to perform additional processing when the template editing mode changes for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Niestandardowe projektantów, pochodzących z <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> klasy można zastąpić <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> metodę w celu dodatkowego przetwarzania podczas edycji zmiany trybu kontrolki na powierzchni projektu szablonu.
